subject: Re: [junit] Getting JUnit 4 from CVS
msgSnippet: quikdraw, What is your exact command line?  Mine is (for Linux and cygwin): cvs -d :pserver:anonymous@cvs.sourceforge.net:/cvsroot/junit co -r Version4 junit
messageBody:
quikdraw,

What is your exact command line? Mine is (for Linux and cygwin):

cvs -d :pserver:anonymous@...:/cvsroot/junit co -r
Version4 junit

Thanks,

David Saff

quikdraw2700 wrote:

> Yes. I have experienced the overloaded SF as well over the years. But
> I've
> been trying on and off for several weeks, daytime/nighttime and weekends,
> and have been unable to get a connection. Given that I've tried
> Eclipse and
> Tortoise as well as various command line CVS clients, and that I'm
> using the
> CVSROOT as specified on the web site, the only way I can think of that it
> would not work is if the CVSROOT had changed or the server was offline.
>
> BTW, I just tried again and got the same: "Error-Ccould not connect to :
> pserver:anonymous@...:/cvsroot/junit" message.
>
> I'm more than willing to try any other suggestions.
>
> On 9/15/05, David Saff <saff@...> wrote:
> >
> > quikdraw,
> >
> > There might be an issue with your setup, but I've found SourceForge
> > anonymous CVS to be unreliable in the past. About once a week, it
> > refuses to respond for a couple hours. Have you tried again since? Good
> > luck,
> >
> > David Saff
> >
> > quikdraw2700 wrote:
> >
> > > Howdy Folks,
> > >
> > > I'm trying to get JUnit 4 from SF using :
> > > pserver:anonymous@...:/cvsroot/junit as described
> > > on http://sourceforge.net/cvs/?group_id=15278 without luck. I've
> tried a
> > > command line CVS client, the Eclipse
> > > 3.1 client and TortoiseCVS. I get varying errors depending on the
> > client,
> > > but they seem to all be related to
> > > either the CVS server timing out or the connection being refused.
> > >
> > > Sorry for the noise on what should be a very simple question, but can
> > > anyone
> > > point out what I'm doing wrong?
> > > Is it possible the JUnit 4 branch was moved to another repository?
> > > --
> > > ----
> > > Thanks,
> > > quikdraw2700@...
> > >
> > >
